vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
θωμᾶς, -ᾶ, ὁ (Heb.: תָּאוֹם, a twin; cf. δίδυμος),
Thomas the Apostle: Mat.10:3, Mrk.3:18, Luk.6:15, Jhn.11:16 14:5 20:24-28 21:2, Act.1:13.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.10.3; also called Twin (KJV: Didymus) at Jhn.11.16; 20.24; 21.2;
§ Thomas, "twin"
Thomas, (Proper name), Mt. 10:3; Mk. 3:18; Lk. 6:15; Jn. 11:16; 14:5; 20:24, 26, 27, 28; 21:2; Acts 1:13*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
多馬 这个陽性專有名詞在亞蘭文的意思是 "孿生子"
使徒之一
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
多马 这个阳性专有名词在亚兰文的意思是 "孪生子"
使徒之一
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Thô-ma « con sanh đôi » Xem H8380
